text: Hi Tessa, that's fine to be completely honest

I am in a strange position compared to other students because I am still in a Foundation course after deferring my 3D Animation course at Hertfordshire for a year. What I would like to know the most from this mentorship is an understanding of studio life, the pipeline of vfx/animation and general advice from your time as an animator

Because of this I am still beginning to learn my skills both in traditional art like drawing and in programs such as Maya. Therefore, I would not be able to ask for technical help as of now. Having said that, I am entering a project now where I want to adapt a clay sculpture I made into a character design, then into concept art and then into 3D using various processes.
